message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, but I'm willing to start negotiations at $120. Let me know if this works for you!
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $100 for it. Let's see if we can work something out.
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $110. Let me know if this works better for you!
